remarks: Construct a new layer on top of 3 given atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2012.)
statement:
3dim0.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
3dim0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
3dim0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
3dim3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> E. s e. A -. s .<_ ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) ) $.
$d .<_ s $.
$d .\/ s $.
$d A s $.
$d A s $.
$d P s $.
$d Q s $.
$d R s $.
